main.title: Start Your Business Setup in Dubai with Confidence

WhyPrimeSetup.title: Why Choose Prime Setup for Business Setup in Dubai
WhyPrimeSetup.subtitle: Setting up a business in Dubai is a major step-Prime Setup makes it simple, secure, and efficient. With over 15 years of experience, we have helped hundreds of entrepreneurs and companies establish themselves in the UAE, guiding them through every legal and administrative detail so they can focus on growth.

swiper.titleh2: How the company setup process works — step by step

items.title: Free Consultation
items.description: We start with a consultation to understand your goals and objectives. We discuss which business structures suit you best and suggest the optimal option for registration. You’ll receive all the information you need to make a decision.

items.title: Personalized Solution
items.description: Based on the consultation, we develop a tailored plan that meets your needs. We select the right license, prepare documents, and set deadlines. All actions are agreed upon with you at each step.

items.title: Document Collection & Preparation
items.description: We collect and verify all necessary documents to ensure your business is registered without delays. We complete all forms, applications, and notarize them if needed.

items.title: Company Registration
items.description: Once documents are ready, we submit them to the appropriate authorities for registration. We monitor the process and keep you updated at every stage. In the end, you receive your license and official confirmations.

items.title: Post-Registration Support
items.description: After registration, we continue to support you. We help open a bank account, arrange visas for staff, and provide accounting and legal assistance. Your business will grow without extra hassle.
